message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this is a competitive price.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is too low for me to consider.  Could you do $18,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

Hi Alice, I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $12,000. I'd like to reiterate my previous offer of $12,000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider buying from John for $12,000
